Q_DESC:
Aryan wants to win a lottery worth Rs 5 crores.The challenge given to Aryan is to find a number from group of numbers(array) which is initially increasing and then decreasing.Since Aryan is not good in numbers he seeks your help.Help Aryan to win the lottery.

Input:
The first line contains size of the array.
The second line contains the elements of the array.

Output:
The output contains the winning lottery number.
